hero.title: SALT: Authentic Indian Flavors, Modern Dining.
hero.subtitle: Discover a culinary journey where traditional Indian recipes are re-imagined for your senses, paired with a vibrant bar & grill experience.

about.title: The SALT Story: A Taste of India Reimagined
about.paragraph1: Welcome to SALT, an Indian Restaurant Bar & Grill where passion for authentic Indian cuisine meets contemporary flair. Our journey began with a simple vision: to create a dining experience that honors the timeless traditions of India while inviting guests to savor them in a sophisticated, vibrant atmosphere.
about.paragraph2: At SALT, every dish is a testament to fresh ingredients, expert craftsmanship, and the rich tapestry of Indian spices. Whether you're gathering with friends for a celebratory feast or enjoying a relaxed evening at our bar, we promise an unforgettable culinary adventure, infused with warmth and genuine hospitality.
